name: parent
license: (EPL-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-exception-2.0 OR MIT)

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn --cwd tasklist-glsp-server build && yarn --cwd tasklist-glsp-client build && yarn copy:static
scripts.clean: yarn --cwd tasklist-glsp-server clean && yarn --cwd tasklist-glsp-client clean && rimraf app
scripts.copy:static: cp -f workspace/diagram.html app/diagram.html && cp -f workspace/example.tasklist app/example.tasklist
